item.title: AbbVie’s newer immunology drugs are offsetting Humira’s decline, sending stock up 5%
item.description: AbbVie’s earnings topped estimates, and it offered an upbeat view of 2025.

item.title: Invest in these safe havens to protect against Trump tariff fallout, Goldman says
item.description: A team from Goldman Sachs says that gold will be one key commodity for investors.

item.title: Intel’s forecast missed by a mile. Here’s why the stock is ‘numb’ to the problem.
item.description: Some analysts say the outlook looks conservative. Another says investors are in wait-and-see mode while Intel works to hire a permanent CEO.

item.title: Here’s what the Apple bears are getting wrong about the stock
item.description: Apple Intelligence may not be the dud that skeptics thought. And while China pressure is real, other emerging markets are compensating.

item.title: Colgate-Palmolive is due for a turnaround, one analyst says. Here’s what can drive it.
item.description: Colgate-Palmolive seems to have “solid positioning” in some categories, despite warning of weak revenue.
